body_html: Cool, thank you @michaelem. I forgot to mention: please base your work on the application-process-2016 remote branch. Only that branch has the foreign keys project1_id and project2_id (or some such) on ApplicationDraft.
body_text: Cool, thank you @michaelem. I forgot to mention: please base your work on the application-process-2016 remote branch. Only that branch has the foreign keys project1_id and project2_id (or some such) on ApplicationDraft.
body: Cool, thank you @michaelem. I forgot to mention: please base your work on the `application-process-2016` remote branch. Only that branch has the foreign keys `project1_id` and `project2_id` (or some such) on `ApplicationDraft`.
